Detailed Description

template<typename TERRAINMAP>
class Terrain::TerrainMapIter< TERRAINMAP >

This class provides iteration over a TerrainMap.

The compiler generated copy constructor and assignment are okay.

Member Typedef Documentation

template<typename TERRAINMAP>
typedef TERRAINMAP::PixelType Terrain::TerrainMapIter< TERRAINMAP >::PixelType

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename TERRAINMAP>
Terrain::TerrainMapIter< TERRAINMAP >::TerrainMapIter ( TERRAINMAP &  terrainMap,
int32  x,
int32  y,
int32  dx = 0,
int32  dy = 0 
) [inline]

This constructs a terrain map iterator.

Parameters:
terrainMap The TerrainMap to iterate over.
x The x coordinate.
y The y coordinate.
dx A x-offset applied to coordinates within the TerrainMap.
dy A y-offset applied to coordinates within the TerrainMap.
